channel.title: Community Update - Late June '19
channel.description:
We’ve been hard at work for the past two weeks finalizing the foundation of the decentralized network and the workflow engine, the next two major features.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://blog.mesg.com/bi-weekly-news-03-07-19/
